# stomp-ws

A library for communication between browser and server using STOMP over websocket.

## Installing

Using npm:

```bash
$ npm install stomp-ws
```

Using yarn:

```bash
$ yarn add stomp-ws
```

Using unpkg CDN:

```html
<script src="https://unpkg.com/stomp-ws/umd/stomp-ws.min.js"></script>
```
